name: TimeCamp
who_it_helps: Small crews that need simple job-costed time tracking tied to payroll and billing.

name: Connecteam
who_it_helps: Owners who want an all-in-one app for scheduling, time clocks, tasks and crew communication.

name: WebHR
who_it_helps: Small businesses that want HR records, leave tracking and payroll in one cloud system.

name: Lano
who_it_helps: US and EU companies hiring contractors or employees in multiple countries and currencies.
inline_note: When you start paying crews or contractors in more than one country, this is usually where I tell people to look at a global payroll platform like Lano so they do not have to figure out each country's tax rules themselves.

name: Tyms / Adam (AI Accountant)
who_it_helps: Small businesses and crew-based companies that want AI to handle bookkeeping, categorization and basic reporting without hiring a full-time accountant.
inline_note: If you are drowning in receipts and basic bookkeeping, this is usually where I suggest trying an AI accountant like Adam from Tyms so you can stay on top of the numbers without hiring a full time bookkeeper.
